articles.title: Service Personnel Meet to Renew Their Pledge
articles.content:
Service Personnel Meet to Renew Their Pledge
 Pyongyang, July 24 (KCNA) -- Service personnel of the Ground, Navy, Air and Anti-Air Force and Strategic Force of the Korean People's Army (KPA) met in front of the Monument to the Victorious Fatherland Liberation War on Friday to vow to glorify forever the exploits the great Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il performed by winning victory in the anti-imperialist war and surely accomplish the great cause of national reunification under the leadership of the respected Supreme Commander Kim Jong Un.
					 Present there were Hwang Pyong So, Pak Yong Sik, Ri Yong Gil, commanding officers of the KPA, service personnel of the KPA Ground, Navy, Air and Anti-Air Force and Strategic Force and cadets of military academies at all levels.
					
					 Army General Ri Yong Gil, chief of the General Staff of the KPA, made a speech at the meeting.
					
					 He said that the shining victory in the Fatherland Liberation War was the victory of Kim Il Sung's Juche-oriented military idea, one of his gifted and original strategies and tactics and war methods and one of mental power of the army and people of the DPRK united close around the party.
					
					 He went on:
					
					 As they held Kim Il Sung in high esteem, the service personnel and people of the DPRK could emerge a heroic army and people who beat back the U.S.-led imperialist allied forces and shattered the myth of "mightiness" of the U.S. imperialists who boasted of being the "strongest" in the world for the first time in the history, and the DPRK could powerfully demonstrate its dignity and might before the whole world as a permanent winner in the war.
					
					 Kim Jong Il led the confrontation with imperialism and the U.S. to one victory after another with his outstanding and seasoned leadership, firmly carrying forward the tradition of the victory established by Kim Il Sung.
					
					 It is the sacred mission of the powerful revolutionary Paektusan army to add shine forever to the great Generalissimos' exploits in the war victory and accomplish the great cause of national reunification at any cost under the leadership of the respected Supreme Commander.
					
					 The speaker called on all service personnel to win the final victory in the confrontation with the U.S. under the leadership of Kim Jong Un, surely accomplish the great cause of national reunification, the lifelong desire of the great Generalissimos, and thus eternally glorify the history and tradition of Songun Korea's victory generation after generation.
					
					 Speeches were made to renew resolution.

articles.title: Senior Party Officials Visit Lodging Quarters of Participants in 4th National Conference of Veterans
articles.content:
Senior Party Officials Visit Lodging Quarters of Participants in 4th National Conference of Veterans
 Pyongyang, July 24 (KCNA) -- Senior officials of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) visited the lodging quarters of the participants in the 4th National Conference of Veterans on Friday.
					 Among them were Choe Ryong Hae, Choe Thae Bok, Kim Phyong Hae, Jo Yon Jun and other officials of the WPK Central Committee and armed forces organs.
					
					 They congratulated the veterans who won a victory in the Fatherland Liberation War by beating back the U.S. imperialist aggressors under the leadership of President Kim Il Sung and devotedly worked in socialist construction and confrontation with the U.S. after the war.
					
					 The fighting spirit displayed by the country's defenders in the great years serves as a powerful ideological and mental weapon of the service personnel and people of the DPRK, they said, asking the veterans to always bear in mind the party's great trust and expectation and creditably perform their duties to bring up the younger generation as reliable successors to the revolution.

articles.title: War Veterans Visit Mangyongdae
articles.content:
War Veterans Visit Mangyongdae
 Pyongyang, July 24 (KCNA) -- The participants in the 4th National Conference of Veterans visited Mangyongdae, the birthplace of President Kim Il Sung, on Friday. 
					 They laid wreaths and bouquets before the graves of Kim Po Hyon and Ri Po Ik, grandparents of the President, and the graves of Kim Hyong Jik and Kang Pan Sok, his parents, and paid silent tribute to them. 
					
					 They went round the historic relics showing the revolutionary life of the President at his old home in Mangyongdae. 
					
					 The participants also visited the Revolutionary Martyrs Cemetery on Mt. Taesong. They laid bouquets before the bust of anti-Japanese war hero Kim Jong Suk and paid silent tribute to her. 
					
					 They laid wreaths and bouquets on the wreath-laying stand of the cemetery and paid tribute to the revolutionary martyrs. 
					
					 They visited the Fatherland Liberation War Martyrs Cemetery to lay wreaths and bouquets on the wreath-laying stand and pay tribute to the martyrs.

articles.title: Day of War Victory Marked by Working People's Organizations
articles.content:
Day of War Victory Marked by Working People's Organizations
 Pyongyang, July 24 (KCNA) -- Performances were given by working people's organizations Friday to celebrate the 62nd anniversary of the victory of the Korean people in the great Fatherland Liberation War.
					 The art squad of the Central Committee of the Kim Il Sung Socialist Youth League gave a performance at the Central Youth Hall.
					
					 The performance began with "July 27 March". Put on the stage were such colorful numbers as dialogic poem "Echo of War Victory" and female solo and pangchang "Nilliri for Songun".
					
					 Wartime songs were presented by officials and members of the Democratic Women's Union of Korea in front of the Jonsung Revolutionary Museum.
					
					 Put on the stage were such numbers as solo and pangchang "Song of Mother" and quintet and chorus "At the Spring Site" and "Song of Spring" which represented the Korean women's fighting spirit and optimistic life during the hard-fought war.
					
					 Agricultural workers gave a performance in Unsan County, South Phyongan Province.
					
					 Put on the stage were such colorful numbers as male solo "Tell, Fireworks of War Victory" and story-telling and song "The Country I Am Defending".
					
					 The performers highly praised President Kim Il Sung for bringing about the victory in the war with his outstanding military idea, original strategy and tactics and extraordinary leadership art and leader Kim Jong Il for adding eternal shine to the ever-victorious history and tradition under the uplifted banner of Songun.

articles.title: National Taekwon-Do All-Star Tournament for Jonsung Cup Closes
articles.content:
National Taekwon-Do All-Star Tournament for Jonsung Cup Closes
 Sariwon, July 24 (KCNA) -- The National Taekwon-Do All-Star Tournament for Jonsung Cup closed with due ceremony in Sariwon City, North Hwanghae Province on Friday. 
					 Players of Taekwon-Do and Paduk (go) fully displayed high technique cultivated in their day-to-day training and strong perseverance.
					
					 Cups, medals and diplomas were awarded to the players who proved successful.
					
					 Present at the closing ceremony were Ri Won Jong, a secretary of the North Hwanghae Provincial Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, officials concerned, sportspersons, youth and students.
					
					 Kim Kyong Ho, chairman of the Korean Taekwon-Do Committee, made a closing address.

articles.title: Swimming Contest among Teachers, Students in Pyongyang Held
articles.content:
Swimming Contest among Teachers, Students in Pyongyang Held
 Pyongyang, July 24 (KCNA) -- A swimming contest among teachers and students in Pyongyang took place at the Swimming Pool of Kim Il Sung University from July 22 to 24.
					 It brought together more than 400 teachers and students selected from over 10 universities like Kim Il Sung University, Kim Chaek University of Technology, Pyongyang University of Architecture and Pyongyang University of Foreign Studies.
					
					 Kim Il Sung University placed first in the students' event and Pyongyang University of Foreign Studies in the teachers' event.

articles.title: Delegation of Vietnamese Paper Nhan Dan Arrives
articles.content:
Delegation of Vietnamese Paper Nhan Dan Arrives
 Pyongyang, July 24 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Vietnamese newspaper Nhan Dan led by Deputy Editor-in-Chief Phan Huy Hien arrived here on Friday.

articles.title: Development of Marine Resources Spurred in DPRK
articles.content:
Development of Marine Resources Spurred in DPRK
 Pyongyang, July 24 (KCNA) -- The development of marine resources has been pushed forward in a far-sighted way in the DPRK according to a new national strategy for developing marine resources.
					 The Ministry of Land and Maritime Transport, the Ministry of Fisheries and the State Hydro-meteorological Administration are paying deep attention to marine survey and observation and research into marine resources, while laying sound material and technical bases for them.
					
					 Researchers of Kim Il Sung University have made successes in the research into marine energy resources, marine information system and marine environmental protection. They are also pushing ahead with the research into searching for fishing ground on the East and West seas of Korea and the ocean and into aquaculture and marine mineral resources.
					
					 The establishment of a latest marine technology park progresses apace.
					
					 Kwak Il Hwan, secretary of the DPRK society for marine studies, told KCNA:
					
					 It is one of important national policies to protect and develop marine resources.
					
					 Students and citizens are encouraged to get more knowledge about the sea through different occasions like the Day of Sea (July 12) and months for maritime physical culture (July and August).
					
					 Big efforts have been paid to putting the research into marine resources on a higher scientific basis.

articles.title: Munsu Water Park Crowded with People
articles.content:
Munsu Water Park Crowded with People
 Pyongyang, July 24 (KCNA) -- The Munsu Water Park on the bank of the Taedong River is crowded with children and citizens these days.
					 The park is 109 000 square meters wide with different pools and tanks of peculiar types including surfing tank, swimming tank, seawater tank and supersonic-wave tank.
					
					 According to Kim Kwan Il, section chief of the park, thousands of people are enjoying themselves in the park every day.
					
					 Indoor and outdoor water tanks, swimming pools and gymnasium are astir with children and citizens, he said.
					
					 Kim Hyon Suk living in Rangnang District, Pyongyang said that she has frequented the park with her family.
					
					 After enjoying in the park, I feel myself young again, she said, adding:
					
					 Supreme leader Kim Jong Un proposed the construction of the water park and solved all the problems arising in its construction. I want to express my heartfelt thanks to the supreme leader.

articles.title: S. Korean Authorities Have No Qualifications to Talk about "Dialogue": Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
S. Korean Authorities Have No Qualifications to Talk about "Dialogue": Rodong Sinmun 
 Pyongyang, July 24 (KCNA) -- Park Geun Hye at a recent meeting of riff-raffs of the "Preparatory Committee for Unification", notorious body for confrontation of social systems, uttered words about "assistance" to someone and "co-responsibility" and shamelessly told that the south was waiting for the north to come out for "dialogue". 
					 Earlier, those of the puppet Ministry of Unification paid lip-service to "respect" for the north-south agreements and "dialogue without precondition" and staged the wordplay that once dialogue is opened, it is possible to discuss various issues. 
					
					 Rodong Sinmun Friday observes in an article in this regard:  
					
					 Such base behavior of the south Korean authorities is aimed at laying the blame for the failure to open dialogue at the door of the north in a bid to divert elsewhere the public criticism of them for the catastrophe of north-south relations and justifying their confrontation policy. 
					
					 Recalling that the south Korean authorities are frantic with the smear campaign and saber-rattling for a war against the north as a shock brigade for implementing the U.S. hostile policy toward it and strategy for invading it, the article notes: It is, therefore, the height of shamelessness for them to trumpet about "dialogue" and "mending of relations." 
					
					 It is quite self-evident that those wicked traitors can never be a partner of dialogue for discussing the issue of inter-Korean relations and the destiny of the nation as they unhesitatingly sell off the fate and interests of the nation, depending on outside forces. 
					
					 What they seek is cooperation with outsiders and confrontation with the fellow countrymen in the north. Their preoccupation is to achieve "unification of social systems" designed to bring down the dignified social system in the DPRK with the backing of the U.S. These servants act according to the scenario for inter-Korean confrontation written by their master, kowtowing to outside forces to defame the nation without an iota of independent consciousness. Such disgusting guys have neither qualifications nor face to talk about "dialogue" before the DPRK.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Dismisses U.S. Assistant Secretary of State's Reckless Remarks on Human Rights
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Dismisses U.S. Assistant Secretary of State's Reckless Remarks on Human Rights
 Pyongyang, July 24 (KCNA) -- At a special press conference to announce the "Country Reports on Human Rights Practices for 2014" some days ago, a U.S. assistant secretary of State vociferated about the "human rights issue" in the DPRK, which was cooked up on the basis of lies and fabrications, and cried out for "changes".
					 Rodong Sinmun Friday says in an article in this regard:
					
					 The U.S. is a wicked quarreler as it shelves its most serious human rights issues in the world and pulls up other countries over their "human rights issues" and a heinous trickster keen to bring down their social systems.
					
					 Many countries are spitting at the U.S. "annual report on the human rights" published to threaten their political stability and seeking collapse of their social and political systems.
					
					 As the international community unanimously rebuffs and denounces, the U.S. is the world's worst grave yard of human rights.
					
					 No matter what jargons the U.S. is making in the world arena to pull up other countries including the DPRK over their "human rights issues," it can never stem the present trend of the era dynamically advancing along the road of independence against imperialism.
					
					 The U.S. should never miscalculate.
					
					 It is sadly mistaken if it thinks that the above-said report will prompt the army and people of the DPRK to give up the Korean-style socialist system centered on the popular masses in which the genuine human rights are guaranteed and that it can deter the DPRK from advancing towards the final victory of socialism.
					
					 The American ruling quarters would be well advised to care about the fate of their country going downhill, with its system rotten to the core.

articles.title: Illegal Surveillance over People by IS Denounced
articles.content:
Illegal Surveillance over People by IS Denounced
 Pyongyang, July 24 (KCNA) -- Han Sang Hui, professor of law post-graduate course of Konkuk University of south Korea, was interviewed by Media Today on July 21 in connection with the illegal use of hacking program by the puppet Intelligence Service.
					 The IS has used the hacking program for surveillance, a violation of the basic rights of the people, he held.
					
					 It is a threat to democracy to collect information about people at will and to use it as a means for controlling them, he noted, adding the illegal surveillance by the IS prevents people from criticizing those in power.
					
					 The surveillance by the power organs meets the interests of specified classes only and brings harms to the people, he stressed.
					
					 The regime does not practice any control over the gathering of information about individuals, he said, urging the regime to bring down the surveillance-ridden society.

articles.title: S. Korean Authorities' Planned Restructuring under Fire
articles.content:
S. Korean Authorities' Planned Restructuring under Fire
 Pyongyang, July 24 (KCNA) -- The south Korean internet newspaper Voice of People on July 22 editorially denounced the puppet authorities' planned restructuring of four fields.
					 Recalling that Park Geun Hye cried out for pushing forward the restructuring of four fields as key tasks of the state administration in the latter half of the year on July 21, the editorial continued:
					
					 The regime plans reforming the fields of public service, labor, education and finance.
					
					 But a scrutiny into it proves that it is little short of act of putting on airs.
					
					 Park did not mention at all the fact that the "government's" biased budget expenditure is the real cause of increasing debts.

articles.title: S. Korean Organization Calls for Return of U.S. Forces' Base
articles.content:
S. Korean Organization Calls for Return of U.S. Forces' Base
 Pyongyang, July 24 (KCNA) -- The All-Citizens Measure Committee for Redeployment of U.S. Forces in Tongduchon City of south Korea sent an open questionnaire to the puppet minister of Defense on July 20.
					 At the end of October, 2014, the puppet authorities agreed with the U.S. to leave the 210 firepower brigade under the U.S. second division in Tongduchon City, Kyonggi Province as it is.
					
					 The puppet authorities' decision to indefinitely extend the transfer of OPECON provided for the indefinite presence of the brigade there. 
					
					 Tongduchon citizens staged an action to recover their cradle while strongly protesting against the unilateral step taken by the authorities without an agreement with region inhabitants. 
					
					 The questionnaire urged the military authorities to clearly respond to the demand of the people.

articles.title: Executive Committees under Chongryon Meet
articles.content:
Executive Committees under Chongryon Meet
 Tokyo, July 23 (KNS-KCNA) -- Executive committees under the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon) met in different parts of Japan to vow to carry out the decision of the second session of the 23rd Central Committee of Chongryon, true to the historic letter sent by Marshal Kim Jong Un to Chongryon and Koreans in Japan on the occasion of the 60th anniversary of its formation.
					 The meetings held in Gunma, Ehime, Yamagata, Tochigi, Yamaguchi and Kagawa reviewed the achievements made in the innovation movement for greeting the 60th anniversary of Chongryon with leaping progress toward a fresh heyday.
					
					 Discussed there were tasks and measures for thoroughly carrying out the five-point tasks set forth in the letter "Let Us Usher In a New Heyday of the Movement of Koreans in Japan True to the Intention of the Great Comrade Kim Jong Il".
					
					 The participants pledged to thoroughly carry out the five tasks advanced b y Kim Jong Un for opening up a fresh heyday in the movement of Koreans in Japan and create new image of Chongryon and the movement.

articles.title: Protest Actions over Ferry Sewol Disaster Staged by Overseas Koreans
articles.content:
Protest Actions over Ferry Sewol Disaster Staged by Overseas Koreans
 Pyongyang, July 24 (KCNA) -- Overseas Koreans are staging actions for the probe into the truth behind the sinking of ferry Sewol, according to Newsis, south Korean internet newspaper on July 21.
					 Koreans residing in New York, London, Berlin, Tokyo and other parts of the world have launched an indefinite hunger strike in demand of a probe into the truth behind the sinking disaster and punishment of those responsible for it and have held rallies at the third weekends of every month for nearly one year.
					
					 Koreans held a protest rally in Manhattan, New York on July 19.
					
					 There took place a signature campaign and rally urging the salvage of Sewol in London and Berlin on July 18. The participants blamed the authorities for dodging the probe into the truth behind the disaster.
					
					 A similar rally was held in Vancouver and Toronto, Canada.
					
					 Koreans in Australia also held a rally in Sydney on July 11 and clarified their will to remember the disaster and wage joint action until the truth is probed.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung Praised by Venezuelan, Guinean Broadcasting Services
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung Praised by Venezuelan, Guinean Broadcasting Services
 Pyongyang, July 24 (KCNA) -- Venezuelan and Guinean broadcasting services praised the revolutionary career and exploits of President Kim Il Sung on July 7 and 8 to observe the 21st anniversary of his demise.
					 Telesur TV of Venezuela showed a video documenting the revolutionary activities of the President.
					
					 The TV reported:
					
					 The President wisely led the DPRK for several decades.
					
					 The liberation of Korea, victory in the fierce war fought against the U.S. imperialists and building of a powerful socialist state that rose from debris are all ascribable to his wise leadership.
					
					 His demise was the most profound sorrow to the Korean people.
					
					 Guinean state, international and seven national languages broadcasting services said that the Korean people and world progressives recollected with deep emotion the life of the President who performed exploits on behalf of the times and history with his outstanding idea and theories and through his dynamic revolutionary activities. 
					
					 He was the most prominent leader, peerlessly great man and great sage of humankind in the 20th century, the broadcasting services noted, adding that though he passed away, his idea and cause are being steadily carried forward.

articles.title: Day of Korea's Liberation to Be Celebrated in Belarus
articles.content:
Day of Korea's Liberation to Be Celebrated in Belarus
 Pyongyang, July 24 (KCNA) -- A Belarusian preparatory committee for celebrating the 70th anniversary of Korea's liberation was formed on July 20.
					 L. Shukolinikov, first secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Workers' Party of Belarus who doubles as chairman of the Permanent Standing Committee of the Belarus National Association of Friends of Korean People Named after Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il, was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.
					
					 The preparatory committee groups personages from political parties and organizations including the above-said party and association, the National Social Federation "For the Union and Union's Communist Party", the International Social Federation "For Motherland and Stalin" and the Social Association "For Democracy, Social Progress and Justice".
					
					 The committee decided to organize diverse political and cultural events on the occasion of Korea's liberation (August 15).

articles.title: Anniversary of Korea's Liberation to Be Celebrated in Sweden
articles.content:
Anniversary of Korea's Liberation to Be Celebrated in Sweden
 Pyongyang, July 24 (KCNA) -- A Swedish preparatory committee for celebrating the 70th anniversary of Korea's liberation was formed on July 17.
					 Christer Lundgren, chairman of the Sweden-Korea Friendship Association, and an executive member of the Goteborg Committee of the Communist Party of Sweden were elected co-chairmen of the preparatory committee.
					
					 The committee decided to hold diverse political and cultural events to praise the exploits President Kim Il Sung performed by liberating Korea on the occasion of Korea's liberation (August 15.)

articles.title: Month of Anti-U.S. Joint Struggle Observed by Int'l Body, Nigerian Organization
articles.content:
Month of Anti-U.S. Joint Struggle Observed by Int'l Body, Nigerian Organization 
 Pyongyang, July 24 (KCNA) -- An international body and a Nigerian organization posted special write-ups on their websites on July 13 and 16 to mark the June 25-July 27 month of anti-U.S. joint struggle.
					 The Korean Friendship Association headquartered in Spain posted on its website articles titled "Invincible and iron-willed commander", "Matchless Korean People's Army", "Victory in the Fatherland Liberation War" and "62nd anniversary of victory in the war" accompanied with photos documenting the exploits of President Kim Il Sung, leader Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The articles highly praised the President as a gifted strategist who defeated the U.S. and Japanese imperialists in one generation and Kim Jong Il as the Songun brilliant commander who added shine to the tradition of the ever-victorious KPA by pursuing the Songun politics.
					
					 The Nigerian National Committee for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism in an article titled "Lesson drawn from the Korean war, U.S. power is not all-mighty" said that the Korean war was a historic event which shattered the U.S. myth of "mightiness" to smithereens. It went on:
					
					 The U.S. is ceaselessly working hard to ignite a new war against the DPRK, far from drawing a lesson from its bitter defeat in the Korean war.
					
					 The DPRK had access to nuclear deterrent to cope with the U.S. extreme nuclear threat and is demonstrating its might as a power capable of mercilessly punishing any provocateurs, no matter where they are on our planet.

articles.title: Demo Staged in Bangladesh in Protest against U.S. Hostile Policy toward DPRK
articles.content:
Demo Staged in Bangladesh in Protest against U.S. Hostile Policy toward DPRK
 Pyongyang, July 24 (KCNA) -- A demonstration against the U.S. hostile policy toward the DPRK was staged in Barisal, Bangladesh on July 18 under the sponsorship of the Bangladesh Group for the Study of the Songun Policy.
					 It was participated in by members of the group, workers, peasants, teachers and students of over 10 schools in Barisal, at least a hundred persons in all.
					
					 Prior to the demonstration, M. Jahangir Khan, chairman of the group, made public a statement.
					
					 The statement said that in order to ensure that the reunification of the Korean peninsula is achieved in an independent and peaceful way as desired by the Korean nation it is necessary for the U.S. to roll back at an early date its hostile policy toward the DPRK that has lasted for more than half a century and immediately stop provocative war exercises in south Korea.
					
					 Its participants marched through streets, holding placards and chanting anti-U.S. slogans.

articles.title: Tiene lugar mitin de juramento de militares
articles.content:
Tiene lugar mitin de juramento de militares
Pyongyang, 24 de julio (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar este viernes en la explanada frente al Monumento a la Victoria en la Guerra de Liberacion de la Patria el mitin de juramento de los oficiales y soldados de las fuerzas terrestres, navales, aereas, antiaereas y estrategicas del Ejercito Popular de Corea para hacer brillar las proezas de victoria de los Generalisimos Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il en la guerra antiimperialista y lograr sin falta la gran causa de reunificacion de la patria bajo la guia del Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Comandante Supremo del EPC. 
					Al acto asistieron Hwang Pyong So, Pak Yong Sik, Ri Yong Gil, los miembros directivos y oficiales y soldados de las fuerzas terrestres, navales, aereas y antiaereas, y estrategicas, del EPC y los cadetes de las academias militares a todos niveles. 
					
					El general de ejercito terrestre Ri Yong Gil, jefe del Estado Mayor General del EPC, pronuncio un discurso. 
					
					El orador dijo que el gran triunfo en la Guerra de Liberacion de la Patria fue la victoria de la autoctona idea militar y de los originales y clarividentes estrategias, tacticas y metodos de combate del Generalisimo Kim Il Sung, y la de la fuerza espiritual del ejercito y pueblo coreanos unidos compactamente en torno al partido. 
					
					Gracias al Generalisimo, el ejercito y el pueblo coreanos se hicieron heroes tras rechazar la invasion armada de las fuerzas aliadas imperialistas encabezadas por EE.UU. y derrotar a los imperialistas yanquis que se jactaban de la "supremacia" mundial, y la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea pudo manifestar a todo el mundo la dignidad y poderio como eterno pais triunfador, afirmo.
					
					Prosiguio que al conducir con la destacada y probada direccion a la victoria la confrontacion antiyanqui y antiimperialista, el Generalisimo Kim Jong Il vino manteniendo con firmeza la tradicion de victoria, creada por el Presidente Kim Il Sung. 
					
					Enfatizo que el ejercito revolucionario del monte Paektu tiene la sagrada mision de glorificar generacion tras generacion las hazanas de los grandes lideres en la victoria de la guerra antiimperialista y lograr sin falta la gran empresa de la reunificacion de la patria bajo la direccion del Comandante Supremo Kim Jong Un. 
					
					Llamo a todos los oficiales y soldados del EPC a lograr la victoria final en la batalla antiyanqui y cumplir la causa de reintegracion territorial de la patria, anhelo de toda la vida de los grandes lideres, apoyando la direccion del Mariscal, llevando adelante de generacion en generacion la historia y la tradicion de la victoria de la Corea del Songun.
					
					A continuacion, pronunciaron discursos de juramento.

articles.title: Cuadros del PTC con participantes en Conferencia Nacional de Veteranos de Guerra
articles.content:
Cuadros del PTC con participantes en Conferencia Nacional de Veteranos de Guerra
Pyongyang, 24 de julio (ACNC) -- Los cuadros directivos del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea visitaron este viernes el alojamiento de los participantes en la IV Conferencia Nacional de Veteranos de Guerra.
					Entre ellos figuran Choe Ryong Hae, Choe Thae Bok, Kim Phyong Hae, Jo Yon Jun y los funcionarios del CC del PTC y de los organismos de las fuerzas armadas.
					
					Los cuadros felicitaron a los veteranos de guerra quienes en acato a la orientacion del Presidente Kim Il Sung, lograron la victoria en la Guerra de Liberacion de la Patria tras rechazar la invasion armada de los imperialistas norteamericanos y en el tiempo posbelico tambien estuvieron al frente de la construccion socialista y de la confrontacion antiyanqui. 
					
					Dijeron que el espiritu de lucha de los defensores de la patria desplegados en aquellos anales orgullosos sirve de poderosa arma ideo-espiritual para los militares y civiles coreanos y encomendaron a los veteranos guardar en lo profundo del corazon la gran confianza y esperanza del partido y cumplir satisfactoriamente con la mision de formar a los miembros de nueva generacion como fidedignos continuadores de la revolucion.
